column2:
"So... [Loser] has finally shown itself.
We'll begin transferring you to the
location of this Dark Falz shortly."

"Once the battle begins, there's
nothing more I can do for you...
I hope you'll all return safely...
Give 'em hell."

"Readings from the corrupted Mothership
are off the charts.
Dark Falz [Loser] has appeared.
You'll be fighting in its domain, so we
have no idea what might happen.
But retreat is not an option.
We must destroy Dark Falz [Loser].
This is our most important battle yet.
――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Be defeated or time limit expires."
